languages.text: Слова, изреченные Владаймом Токара во время мучительной казни, не были забыты. Нижние отсеки Футфола заполонили бормочущие безумцы, повторявшие отрывки из речи убиенного Наместника. Спустя терранский год после его казни случилась великая резня — разом замолкнув, бормочущие безумцы выхватили ножи и кровавой бурей прошлись по станции, убив множество людей. Все они были истреблены, и более на Футфоле не проявлялась сия напасть, но в трущобах многих планет Простора стали слышны шепоты, повторявшие последние слова Владайма.

The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Слова, изреченные Владаймом Токара во время мучительной казни, не были забыты. Спустя терранский год после его казни случилась великая резня — разом замолкнув, бормочущие безумцы выхватили ножи и кровавой бурей прошлись по станции, убив множество людей. Все они были истреблены, и более на Футфоле не проявлялась сия напасть, но в трущобах многих планет Простора стали слышны шепоты, повторявшие последние слова Владайма.

traits.locale_text: The words spoken by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. Lower modules of Footfall got flooded by lunatics muttering excerpts of the last speech of the murdered Liege. A Terran cycle after his execution, a great massacre happened. All the muttering lunatics suddenly fell silent at the same time, took out their knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were eliminated, and this disaster was never seen on the Footfall again. Yet in the slums of many a planet of the Expanse, such whispers echoing the last words of Vladaym could be heard.

The words spoken by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. Lower modules of Footfall got flooded by lunatics muttering excerpts of the last speech of the murdered Liege. A Terran cycle after his execution, a great massacre happened. All the muttering lunatics suddenly fell silent at the same time, took out their knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were eliminated, and this disaster was never seen on the Footfall again. Yet in the slums of many a planet of the Expanse, such whispers echoing the last words of Vladaym could be heard.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉被处决时所说的遗言并没有被人们遗忘。在那之后，落脚港底层聚集起了一群疯子，不断念叨着他的遗言。弗拉迪姆死亡的一个泰年期过后，落脚港内发生了一场大屠杀。那些疯子突然沉默了下来，掏出刀子，仿佛一场血红色的风暴席卷了星站，杀害了许多人。后来，这些疯子被彻底消灭了，而从那以后，落脚港再也没有发生过类似的灾难。然而，弗拉迪姆的遗言仍回荡在科罗努斯扩区诸多行星的贫民窟中。
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉被处决时所说的遗言并没有被人们遗忘。在那之后，落脚港底层聚集起了一群疯子，不断念叨着他的遗言。弗拉迪姆死亡的一个泰拉周期过后，落脚港内发生了一场大屠杀。那些疯子突然沉默了下来，掏出刀子，仿佛一场血红色的风暴席卷了星站，杀害了许多人。后来，这些疯子被彻底消灭了，而从那以后，落脚港再也没有发生过类似的灾难。然而，弗拉迪姆的遗言仍回荡在科罗努斯扩区诸多行星的贫民窟中。

languages.text: Die Worte, die Vladaym Tocara während seiner qualvollen Hinrichtung äußerte, wurden nicht vergessen. Die unteren Ebenen von Footfall wurden von Wahnsinnigen überrannt, die Fetzen der letzten Worte des ermordeten Lehnsherren murmelten. Ein terranisches Jahr nach seiner Hinrichtung gab es ein gewaltiges Massaker. Die geisteskranken Wahnsinnigen verstummten plötzlich alle gleichzeitig, zückten Messer und fegten durch die Station wie ein roter Sturm, der viele tötete. Letztlich wurden sie ausgelöscht und Footfall erlebte nie wieder eine solche Katastrophe. Doch Vladayms letzte Worte hallten in den Slums vieler Planeten in der Ausdehnung wider.
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Die Worte, die Vladaym Tocara während seiner qualvollen Hinrichtung äußerte, wurden nicht vergessen. Die unteren Ebenen von Footfall wurden von Wahnsinnigen überrannt, die Fetzen der letzten Worte des ermordeten Lehnsherren murmelten. Einen terranischen Zyklus nach seiner Hinrichtung gab es ein gewaltiges Massaker. Die geisteskranken Wahnsinnigen verstummten plötzlich alle gleichzeitig, zückten Messer und fegten durch die Station wie ein roter Sturm, der viele tötete. Letztlich wurden sie ausgelöscht und Footfall erlebte nie wieder eine solche Katastrophe. Doch Vladayms letzte Worte hallten in den Slums vieler Planeten in der Ausdehnung wider.

languages.text: Les mots prononcés par Vladaym Tocara lors de sa terrible exécution ne furent pas oubliés. Les niveaux inférieurs de Castel furent bientôt envahis d'aliénés marmonnant certaines des dernières paroles du défunt suzerain. Un an de Terra après son exécution, la station fut le théâtre d'un grand massacre. Les aliénés se turent tous d'un même coup, brandirent des couteaux et déferlèrent sur la population comme une tempête écarlate qui laissa de nombreuses victimes dans son sillage. Ils furent exterminés jusqu'au dernier et Castel ne connut plus jamais un tel désastre. Pourtant, les derniers mots de Vladaym continuèrent de résonner à travers les bas quartiers de nombreuses planètes des Étendues.
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Les mots prononcés par Vladaym Tocara lors de sa terrible exécution ne furent pas oubliés. Les niveaux inférieurs de Castel furent bientôt envahis d'aliénés marmonnant certaines des dernières paroles du défunt suzerain. Un cycle de Terra après son exécution, la station fut le théâtre d’un grand massacre. Les aliénés se turent tous d'un même coup, brandirent des couteaux et déferlèrent sur la population comme une tempête écarlate qui laissa de nombreuses victimes dans son sillage. Ils furent exterminés jusqu'au dernier et Castel ne connut plus jamais un tel désastre. Pourtant, les derniers mots de Vladaym continuèrent de résonner à travers les bas quartiers de nombreuses planètes des Étendues.

languages.text: Las palabras que murmuró Vladaym Tocara durante su dolorosa ejecución no cayeron en el olvido. Los niveles inferiores de Paso se llenaron de lunáticos que repetían fragmentos de las últimas frases del Señor asesinado. Un año terrano después de su muerte, tuvo lugar una gran masacre. Los lunáticos dementes se quedaron en silencio abruptamente al mismo tiempo, se armaron con cuchillos y recorrieron la estación como una tormenta carmesí, matando a muchísimas personas. Todos ellos fueron exterminados, y Paso jamás fue testigo de otra catástrofe de esa magnitud. Aun así, las últimas palabras de Vladaym siguieron haciendo eco en los barrios bajos de muchos planetas de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Las palabras que murmuró Vladaym Tocara durante su dolorosa ejecución no cayeron en el olvido. Los niveles inferiores de Paso se llenaron de lunáticos que repetían fragmentos de las últimas frases del Señor asesinado. Un ciclo terrano después de su muerte, tuvo lugar una gran masacre. Los lunáticos dementes se quedaron en silencio abruptamente al mismo tiempo, se armaron con cuchillos y recorrieron la estación como una tormenta carmesí, matando a muchísimas personas. Todos ellos fueron exterminados, y Paso jamás fue testigo de otra catástrofe de esa magnitud. Aun así, las últimas palabras de Vladaym siguieron haciendo eco en los barrios bajos de muchos planetas de la Extensión.

languages.text: ヴラダイム・トカラが凄惨な処刑の最中に発した言葉は忘れられることはなかった。フットフォールの下層階は、殺された領主の最後の言葉の断片を呟く狂人たちで溢れかえった。彼の処刑から1地球年後、大虐殺が起こった。狂気に取りつかれた者たちは突然一斉に沈黙し、ナイフを取り出すと深紅の嵐のようにステーションを襲い、多くの者を殺害した。彼らは最後の一人まで駆逐され、フットフォールは二度とこのような災難に見舞われることはなかった。しかしヴラダイムが最後に残した言葉は、エクスパンス内にある多くの惑星のスラム街に今も響いている。
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.

languages.text: İşkencesi ve idamı sırasında Vladaym Tocara'nın sarf ettiği sözler unutulmadı. Binliman'ın alt seviyeleri, öldürülen Emîr'in son sözlerinden parçalar mırıldanan delilerle dolup taştı. İdamından bir Terra yılı sonra büyük bir katliam yaşandı. Dengesiz deliler; birdenbire, hep birlikte sessizliğe gömüldü, bıçaklarını aldı ve istasyonda kızıl bir fırtına gibi eserek sayısız insanı öldürdü. Delilerin her biri katledildi ve bir daha da Binliman'da böyle bir felaket yaşanmadı. Yine de Vladaym'ın son sözleri, Enginlik'teki birçok gezegenin varoşlarında yankılanmayı sürdürüyor.
languages.original_text: The words uttered by Vladaym Tocara during his torturous execution were not forgotten. The lower levels of Footfall became flooded with lunatics muttering scraps of the murdered Liege's final words. One Terran year after his execution, there was a great massacre — the deranged lunatics suddenly fell silent all at once, took out knives, and swept through the station like a crimson storm, killing many. They were exterminated to the last, and Footfall never saw a disaster of the like again. Yet, Vladaym's last words still echoed in the slums of many a planet in the Expanse.
